title: Email not receiving or sending
content:
On 5th June I received the following message when I opened up my email.

Warning: Potential Security Risk Ahead. Thunderbird detected a potential security threat and did not continue to live.thunderbird.net If you visit this site attackers could try to steal information like your passwords, emails or credit card details.

I have not received any emails since then. Nor able to send any. I can receive and send my emails through my Mail provider- Telstra Bigpond and also receive and send on my Apple iPad and Phone. I have tried turning the computer on and off but this does not help although I am no longer receiving the warning message. Hope you can help fix this. Regards Dawn Howell
creator: mdhowell

title: i can recieve emails but can't send
content:
I keep getting the following mesage, this has started all of a sudden, computer did a windows 11 upodate yesterday.

Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail. The mail server responded: Sender Policy - Relay Denied 211.30.49.152 authenticated connections ONLY. OB303 e{391cd896-4e9f-4d6a-9932-850a9ace859b}. Please verify that your email address is correct in your account settings and try again.
creator: whatfamily

title: Pasting Word document into email
content: I'm a freelance writer, and often when querying an agent or publisher, they ask me to send the first "x" pages of in the body of the email (NOT as an attachment), and they want it double-spaced. It's double-spaced in Word, but when I paste it into T'bird, it's single-spaced. I've tried everything I can think of, to no avail. Is there a solution or work-around?
creator: joanm48

title: How to customize 'Today' in the calendar
content:
Hi there. I am looking for a way to modify the color, style and size of the current day number (Today) in the Mini-Month of the Calendar pane. If there is a css to modify it, I guess it should also apply to the Mini-Month in the Today Pane. But I am mostly interested in the Calendar pane.

The current one view is fine, but I sometimes get a bit lost when navigating the Calendar. Thanks
creator: mint.kelp741

title: PROBLEMA CON POSA IN ARRIVO
content:
Buongiorno,

utilizzo thunderbird come server di posta, mi sono accorto pero' che nelle caselle di posta mi cancella le mail, le conserva sino ad una certa data e poi spariscono.

Grazie
creator: studiomaurizio.fois

title: POP-e-mailaccounts bundelen , hoe ?
content:
POP-e-mailaccounts bundelen , hoe ?

probeer e-mail accounts te koppelen in een postvak in, daarvoor in de hulp pagina's gekeken maar ik herken de aanwijzingen met plaatjes niet ( is blijkbaar versie 2018) heb nu voor het eerst thunderbird willen gebruiken.

Graag een instructie hoe ik dat moet doen met versie 115.11.1 (64-bits)
creator: wl445566

title: MESSAGGIO NON LETTO SU VARIE POSTAZIONI CON STESSO INDIRIZZO
content: E' possibile avere una gestione separata per lo stato di "lettura/non lettura" per un indirizzo mail condiviso su più PC, mi spiego meglio, un ufficio con 4 pc dove su tutti è installato un indirizzo mail uguale, quindi se lo legge/apre postazione 1 risulta letto da tutte le altre postazione, ci sarebbe un opzione per far si che sui pc dove il messaggio non è stato letto risulti ancora come MAIL DA LEGGERE? Grazie per il supporto.
creator: logistica15

title: Timeout to/from imap.virginmedia.com server
content: For the last 2 or 3 days I have been receiving the above message when accessing emails. I have experienced this problem occasionally in the past and for a day at most, the problem usually associated with virginmedia. However this is now proving to be disruptive and I don't where the problem lies, with Thunderbird or Virgin. None of my settings etc. have been changed and I can access everything if I go directly to the virginmedia website but the handling of the emails is cumbersome. Any ideas?
creator: daddy.ricky
